title: I want to live in America but everyone thinks it's a bad idea
body: So when i tell my parents i wanna live in America they always say its not gopd bcs u cant get insurance and there is a lot of murder. So do u guys think i should still go bcs u know i can live pretty safe and also im fine with getting murdered i just wanna have atleast 10 years of living in America. And i want to go in KFC and i also want to have jacuzzi but if i go in shop i might get shot what do you guys think???
